DataElement.preferredName: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Positive Patient Refuse Cessation Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy Assessment Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicates yes / no as to whether a HIV positive patient is willing to suspend HAART therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Positive Patient Refuse Cessation Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Whether a HIV positive patient is willing to suspend HAART therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Human immunodeficiency virus. Species of LENTIVIRUS, subgenus primate lentiviruses (LENTIVIRUSES, PRIMATE), formerly designated T-cell lymphotropic virus type III/lymphadenopathy-associated virus (HTLV-III/LAV). It is acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations, neurologic disorders, and immunologic abnormalities linked to the ACQUIRED IMMUNODEFICIENCY SYNDROME.:Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI):A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.
Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI)
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Refuse Cessation Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.:A stopping.:Drug therapy which targets retrovirus function by multiple mechanisms.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.
Drug therapy which targets retrovirus function by multiple mechanisms.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
